name: Ghosts'n Gardener
description:
This game was created in 48 hours for the miniBeansjam 5 in April 2020!

Description

You are a graveyard gardener, trying to get a quiet night's sleep.
But it looks like your slumber has been disturbed by annoying ghosts.
Grab you trusty leaf vacuum and slam them into the ground, where they belong.

Controls

Keyboard
Move with WASD or the arrow keys 
Action -> Spacebar 
Release -> R

Gamepad
Move with left control stick or DPad 
Action -> Right Trigger
Release -> X-Button

Credits

flash_miller (dev)
Bentofox (dev)
LuBu (dev, vfx)

Vault Kid (sound)
